product_name: Black Diamond Mini Pearabiner Screwgate Carabiner - Blemished
long_description: A compact, lightweight locker with a non-snagging keylock nose and a screwlock sleeve, the Black Diamond Mini Pearabiner Carabiner has a large rope-bearing surface for smooth belays and rappels. Keylock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip. The sleeve locks on the gate, eliminating the possibility of the 'biner being over-tightened or "frozen" when loaded. Blemished; item has minor cosmetic blemishes that do not affect product performance.
short_description: A compact, lightweight locker with a non-snagging keylock nose and a screwlock sleeve, the Black Diamond Mini Pearabiner Carabiner has a large rope-bearing surface for smooth belays and rappels.
